where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT EXISTS ( SELF \ product_definition . name ) OR ( SELF \ product_definition . name = 'assembly module' )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( du <* QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.' + 'RELATED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION' ) | pdr \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'design usage' ) | ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'LIBRARY_DEFINED_ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' ] * TYPEOF ( du . relating_product_definition ) ) = 1 ) AND ( du . relating_product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design usage' ) AND ( du . relating_product_definition \ product_definition . name = 'assembly module' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design usage' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sa <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT.OF_SHAPE' ) | ( 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( sa ) ) AND ( sa \ shape_aspect . description = 'pca terminal' ) ) ) >= 2 ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name ) OR ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name = 'assembly module' )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . used_representation ) ) ) >= 1 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( mct <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'member connected terminal' ) | 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'PART_CONNECTED_TERMINALS_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( mct . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'pca terminal' ) ) OR ( ( SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF . of_shape . definition ) * [ 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'LIBRARY_DEFINED_ASSEMBLY_DEFINITION' ] ) >= 1 ) AND ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design usage' ) )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR7
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_USAGE_VIEW_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'interface terminal' ) ) <= 1
